DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change may occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study look DNA variation RASSF1A gene young patient Wilms ' tumor .
DOC.brief_title: DNA Variations Gene Young Patients With Wilms ' Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine presence A133S polymorphism RASSF1A tumor suppressor gene screen germline DNAs child Wilms ' tumor . - Determine inheritance pattern A133S polymorphism evaluate parent child carry polymorphism . Secondary - Determine difference age diagnosis , stage , histology , site primary tumor , outcome , patient vs without A133S polymorphism . - Determine whether S131F RASSF1A variant true polymorphism patient . - Determine polymorphic difference gene patient base ethnicity sex . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord age diagnosis , stage , histology , site primary tumor , outcome . Genomic DNA sample purify peripheral blood patient control analyzed polymerase chain reaction RASSF1A gene . DNA also analyze parent patient A133S polymorphism . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 471 participant ( 229 Wilms ' tumor patient 200 control participant plus 42 parent ) accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis Wilms ' tumor OR Control participant match race , sex , age No prior concurrent history cancer OR Parents child involve study PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
DOC.keyword: recurrent Wilms tumor childhood kidney tumor
